players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night. Charlie, can you tell us about your actions last night?"
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso, he's been quiet all day and didn't investigate anyone."
